parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the fuel sensor strip can cause the fuel level to be inaccurately displayed, leading to sudden stalling of the motorcycle, which can increase the risk of accidents, especially on highways.
symptoms: The fuel light flashes
the warning triangle appears on the dashboard
the motorcycle stalls suddenly
the fuel level is inaccurately displayed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the fuel pump can cause fuel leaks, which can lead to fires, especially when the fuel comes into contact with hot engine components.
symptoms: Fuel leaks from the fuel pump
fuel smell
fuel dripping from the fuel pump housing
fuel spraying onto the rider's leg.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Leaks in the fuel tank can cause fuel to spill onto the road, increasing the risk of accidents, and can also lead to fires.
symptoms: Fuel leaks from the fuel tank
cracks on the periphery of the fuel quick-disconnect port
fuel dripping from the fuel tank.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Forward Drive Shaft Universal Joint Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the forward drive shaft universal joint can cause the rear wheel to lock, leading to a loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries. The spinning drive shaft can also damage surrounding components, such as the swing arm, and potentially cause a fire.
symptoms: Sudden vibration or bucking from the rear of the bike
rear wheel locking up
smoke or flames from the swing arm boot
odd vibration in the bike when the suspension unloads.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the fuel level indicator can cause the engine to shut off unexpectedly, even when there is adequate fuel in the tank, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The engine shuts off suddenly while driving
the fuel level indicator malfunctions
the bike starts again after stopping.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS system can cause the system to engage and turn off independently without warning, which can lead to loss of control and accidents.
symptoms: The ABS system engages and turns off without warning
the vehicle's brakes malfunction
the ABS control unit needs to be replaced.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the fuel gauge sensor strip can cause the fuel gauge to malfunction, leading to inaccurate fuel level readings, which can result in unexpected engine stalling, accidents, or stranding in heavy traffic or remote areas.
symptoms: Fuel gauge does not work or works intermittently
fuel gauge shows incorrect fuel level
sudden loss of fuel to the engine
engine stalling
running out of gas without warning.
